description: A law requiring NGOs to disclose foreign funding is "discriminatory", the EU's top court said.
title: Hungary 'broke EU law with foreign funding rules'
title_page: Hungary 'broke EU law with foreign funding rules' - BBC News
maintext: According to the ECJ, the law restricts the free movement of capital - one of the four founding principles of the European Union - because it "establishes a difference in treatment between national and cross-border movements".
